system.Text:
**When you check to see if you have a specific helpful item or resource**, roll +supply.

On a **strong hit**, you have it, and are ready to act. Take +1 momentum.

On a **weak hit**, you have it, but must choose one.

  * Your supply is diminished: @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.0fcfea7696d1de15]{Sacrifice Resources} (-1)
  * It's not quite right, and causes a complication or delay: @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-2)

On a **miss**, you don't have it and the situation grows more perilous. @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.

Trigger.Text: When you check to see if you have a specific helpful item or resource...

Strong Hit.Text: You have it, and are ready to act. Take +1 momentum.

Weak Hit.Text:
You have it, but must choose one.

  * Your supply is diminished: @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.0fcfea7696d1de15]{Sacrifice Resources} (-1)
  * It's not quite right, and causes a complication or delay: @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-2)

Miss.Text: You don't have it and the situation grows more perilous. @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.
